mega.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: very big and impressive or enjoyable
mega.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Their first record was a mega hit.
mega.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a million – used with units of measurement
mega.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Three bank mega-mergers have been announced in the last two months.
We are not looking for huge mega-returns on our investment.
That’s the mega-decision the president has to make.
